title: 311 Cases by Channel
description: These are the service requests created by 311, categorized by the channel on which they were submitted. 311 offers customers 4 channels to submit service requests: by calling 311, using the SF311 Mobile App, visiting our website, or messaging us through Twitter. This report differs from 311-Cases in that it includes all case types created in the SF311 system, but not cases created by other agencies. This dataset is updated on a monthly basis.

columns.name: Month
columns.description: Month in which service requests were opened.

columns.name: Mobile
columns.description: Service requests made with 311 mobile app.

columns.name: Phone
columns.description: Service requests made by phone to 311 Call Center.

columns.name: Summary
columns.description: Total service requests for the month.

queries.Monthly: SELECT date_trunc_ym(month) AS month, sum(mobile) AS mobile, sum(web) AS web, sum(phone) AS phone, sum(twitter) AS twitter, sum(summary) AS summary WHERE month >= start_date GROUP BY month
queries.Yearly: SELECT date_trunc_y(month) AS year, sum(mobile) AS mobile, sum(web) AS web, sum(phone) AS phone, sum(twitter) AS twitter, sum(summary) AS summary WHERE year >= start_date GROUP BY year
